description: This file is a Streamlit application script for the Gemini Tutor AI assistant. It sets up the user interface, manages session state, initializes the AI agent, handles user input, and processes responses from the agent, including streaming content and displaying tools and citations.

methods.name: initialize_session_state
methods.description: Initializes session state variables for the Streamlit app, including agent, model, education level, messages, and processing flags.

methods.name: render_sidebar
methods.description: Renders the configuration sidebar allowing model and education level selection, and handles reset actions.

methods.name: initialize_or_update_agent
methods.description: Creates or updates the TutorAppAgent instance based on current session state settings.

methods.name: render_chat_history
methods.description: Displays the chat messages stored in session state, including assistant tools and citations.

methods.name: handle_user_input
methods.description: Handles user input for learning topics, submitting the request, and triggering agent response processing.

methods.name: process_agent_response
methods.description: Processes the response from the AI agent, including streaming content, handling tools and citations, and updating chat history.
